missing-font.alert.title: Missing font.
missing-font.modal.title: Missing font
missing-font.modal.content:
## Step 1: Download

To get the font, go to [https://visualidentity.capgemini.com/](https://visualidentity.capgemini.com/frog-brand/brand-foundation/resources-downloads/) and download it.

## Step 2: Installation

- Open the **"Font Book"** app on your Mac.
- Drag and drop the font folder into the **"Font Book"** window.
missing-font.modal.description: To generate your CV in PowerPoint format, the *{{font}}* font is required.
toast-success.reset-data: All data has been successfully reset.
settings.language.title: Change language
settings.language.description: Select the display language of the application. This will adjust the language of the user interface and all related content.
settings.theme.title: Theme
settings.theme.description: Choose a theme to customize the appearance of the app.
settings.option-translate.deepl.title: Translation with DeepL
settings.option-translate.deepl.descript: Enable this option to allow translation via DeepL. A "Translate" button will appear next to the fields to be translated.
An API key is required to use the translation feature. You can subscribe to different plans based on your needs on DeepL's website. A free plan offers up to 500,000 characters for translation per month.
If you already have an API key, you can find it in your **[DeepL account](https://www.deepl.com/en/your-account/keys)**.
settings.option-translate.deepl.api-usag: You have {{value}} characters left for translation.
